title: King.Arthur.II.The.Role.Playing.Wargame.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

King.Arthur.II.The.Role.Playing.Wargame.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Year: 2012
Genre: Strategy (Real-time / Turn-based) / 3D
Developer: Neocore Games
Publisher: Paradox Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: PROPHET




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP2), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2
processor with a clock frequency of 2 GHz or higher
Memory: 1.5 GB
Video: 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(ATI 3850 or Nvidia 8800GTS)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 21.5 GB

Game information:

Continuation of the heroic strategy of "King Arthur", has won
recognition among fans of the genre and highly regarded by critics.
The game will unfold many years later after young Arthur pulled the
sword from a stone wonderful, united Britain, rallied around itself
the Knights of the Round Table, and through the power of the Holy
Grail to ensure peace and tranquility of Camelot. But this saga,
which has developed legends, not ends. Coming new dark ages ...

Game Features:

The gloomy atmosphere. Maimed King Arthur must make every
effort to return the greatness fragmented country
and thus heal itself.
More - more. Fascinating story, epic battles with
otherworldly powers, the growing influence of the
morale of the soldiers on the course of battles -
the game has become even more exciting.
Life for the King! To crush many enemies, the hero
will need a huge army.
New tests and feats. Forces the hero to the fierce
battle with unprecedented powerful beings who can
strike fear in anyone.
Hitting the imagination. Plenty of options for
controlling the camera, improved animation and
extensive training - a unique game experience
and an unforgettable experience guaranteed.

Repack Features:

King Arthur 2: The Role-Playing Wargame
Version of the game - v1.1.08
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers)

Additions:

The Dead Legions
